And people are but the problem there is this I dont know, its networking. So you need to meet people. You have to travel. You have to be in the clubs. You need to meet the agents. You need to meet the players. You have to be on hand. And thats the problem. When I used to live in Germany, I was traveling 20 days of the month, man. Because you have to travel now. Is there anything that technology can change? Yes, but you need to have the contact. When youre there, people see you in the stadium. The other agents see you, the players see you. What you said people have to see you. In this business, its all about image. You have to be present with your client. You have five clients. With each one of them five days. Thats 25 days of the month. And five days is not a lot. You have to do endorsement deals. They got to go photo shooting. You do all these other stuff, important games, like Champions League games, world cup games, whatever. You have to be present. You cant send somebody else to do it.
